summary: Remove the time limit on werewolves. SKSE or Script Dragon not required.
descriptionHtml:
This little mod removes the time limit on werewolves. You no longer need to feed your bloodlust in order to extend/maintain your transformation.

[color=red]To avoid getting stuck in werewolf form for the rest of your life, you\'ll also need the following mod by MGoods to let you toggle between your werewolf and normal form:[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12017]Werewolf Toggle no Scriptdragon[/url]

SKSE or Script Dragon are not required. For those who prefer SKSE/SD mods, or for those having compatibility issues with other mods, use this instead of mine: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2041 (adds toggle and removes time limit)
author: rafale09
